original_text: whatever complaints i might have , i'd take [its] earnest errors and hard-won rewards over the bombastic self-glorification of other feel-good fiascos like antwone fisher or the emperor's club any time .
generated_text:
1. "I'd rather take the genuine heart of 'The Pursuit of Happyness' over the shallow optimism of 'The Bucket List' any day."
2. "I prefer the authentic struggles of 'The Blind Side' to the over-the-top melodrama of 'The Notebook'."
3. "Give me the humble heroism of 'Erin Brockovich' over the self-congratulatory 'A Beautiful Mind' any time."
4. "I'd choose the relatable underdog story of 'Rocky' over the flashy, feel-good 'Remember the Titans'."
